title: MNC Printing - Create and deploy screenshots service to turn ebis web page into PDF
MNC - 1st Yr International player on Pending Clipboard
custom_steps:
1st Year International Amateurs on a 1st Yr Domestic MNC do not display on the Pending Approvals clipboard

Steps to Repro

1 log in as Club

2 Create a MNC for a 1st Yr International Amateur

3 select Domestic Club and fill out all required fields

4 Submit Terms

5 View Pending Approvals clipboard as BOC approver

expected - row for recently submitted MNC displays 

actual - MNC is missing 

[https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/minor-contract?mncId=31020713&playerId=835133|https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/minor-contract?mncId=31020713&playerId=835133|smart-link] 



QA NOTE - MNC displays in Pending Approvals clipboard as expected for 1st Yr International when signed to the DSL and MNC remains as a first yr international MNC

title: As MNC Admin, I want printed Offset Salary Term Updated
MNC - 1st Yr International Add B section
custom_steps:
+related to+ [+PIVOTAL-1581+|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1581]

When the user selects a domestic club for an International Ama, the fields in the Add B sections for Signing Bonus, SB with Visa Contingency, Dual Sport, Dual Sport with Visa, and Contingency Bonus are gone and user cant enter anything into the table. If the User selects the DSL club, the tables/fields in these sections work as expected 

Expected - DSL screenshot

Actual - domestic club screenshot

[https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/int-player-profile/info?playerId=832586|https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/int-player-profile/info?playerId=832586|smart-link]  

you can use the above player and create a contract for him. I created and saved a preliminary contract but upon further investigation, if the user saves the MNC and then Edits, the tables/fields work as expected.

title: MNC - 500 error Submitting Terms
custom_steps:
Club users are receiving a 500 error Submitting terms when a 1st Year International players is signed to a domestic club

Steps to Repro:

1 log in as test-tor-admin

2 search for international amateur that is eligible to sign

3 create MNC

4 select domestic club (not DSL)

5. fill out all required fields and click Submit Terms

expected - terms submitted

actual - 500 error. 

[https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/minor-contract?mncId=31020661&playerId=999766|https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/minor-contract?mncId=31020661&playerId=999766|smart-link]  

the above MNC is in preliminary state with all the required fields filled in. Clicking Submit Terms should fire the error

QA Note - This works fine for the 1st yr international when the club is from the DSL



related to [+PIVOTAL-1585+|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1585]

title: As an MNC Admin, I want both telephone and cell phone to populate Addendum As
custom_steps:
AC:

* Printed MNCs will have both Telephone and Cell Phone fields in the Addendum A section
* Telephone will be populated with the primary phone number from the player's profile (should be current behavior, shout if not)
* Cell Phone will be populated with the phone number on the playerâ€™s profile that has a type of â€œCell Phoneâ€�
* If a Cell Phone number is listed as primary phone, both fields will be populated with the cell phone number
* If there is no Cell Phone number on the playerâ€™s profile, that field will be blank on the Add C

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Addedum C to display salaries for each year of the term
custom_steps:
AC:

* Addendum Cs will be updated to display a column for each year of the term of the contract
** if the contract is 7 years, there will be 6 columns
** if the contract is 2 years, there will be 2 columns
* The columns will display the bargained salary values per level (stored in a table/constant?) on First Year Contracts 
** These salaries will not be editable
* These columns will be blank and editable on non-first year contracts
* There will be a row for DSL, which will be editable, but not required, on all Addendum Cs

title: As an MNC Admin, I want previous contract type captured on Non-First Year MNCs
custom_steps:
AC:

* On Non-First Year MNCs, there will be a Previous Contract field in the Addendum A section
* The field will be required
* The field will be a drop-down with the following options:
** Assigned from Major League Club
** Completed Previous Minor League Contract (free agent)
** Released Player
** Major League Free Agent
** Foreign Professional
** Successor Contract
* The value entered into this field will be reflected on the printed contract (circled, asterisk, underline, etc)

title: As a MNC Admin, I want EBIS to determine the term length for a First Year Domestic Contract
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a First Year Domestic MNC is created for a player, the system will run logic to determine the term of the contract
** If the player is 19 years old or older on the June 5th prior to the signing date, the term of the contract will be 6 years
** If the player is 18 years old or younger on the June 5th prior to the signing date, the term of the contract will be 7 years
* Term refers to the â€œFor Season(s)â€�
* The field will not be editable for club users
* BOC MNC Admins will be able to edit the field
* International players who sign a first year domestic contract should follow the same logic.

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Terms of Non-First Year MNCs to be limited for Club Users
custom_steps:
AC:

* The â€œFor Season(s) dropdown in the Addendum A section of Non-First year contracts will be limited to 1-2 years for Club Users
* BOC users will continue to have 1-7 years in the dropdown

title: As a MNC Admin, I want WhatsApp Added as a Phone Type
custom_steps:
AC:

* WhatsApp will be added as a new phone number type
* WhatsApp numbers will populate the WhatsApp field in the Addendum A section of Minor League Contracts

title: As a BOC Admin, I want salaries by level updated for Add Cs
custom_steps:
Context: â€œIt's not preventing them from submitting (they can just hit ignore and continue) but it is confusing clubs and they end up submitting those old values because EBIS is telling them too. And then my understanding is the old values automatically populate as well so many clubs just aren't changing them.â€�



AC:

* The Salary rule check for salary by level will be updated to match what is dictated by the new mCBA
* The default domestic and alien salary structures will also be updated

title: As a BOC Admin, I want ebis to determine MNC Type Based on Signing Club
custom_steps:
Context: All players signed to a Domestic Affiliate must be on a Domestic contract

AC:

* If a player not subject to the R4 Draft has a new 1st year contract created, the system will create a First Year International Contract for the player by default
* If the user selects a signing club that is a domestic affiliate (not in the DSL), the contract will reload as a First Year Domestic Contract



Note: this should not come into play for First Year Domestic Contracts or Non-First Year Contracts

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Australian Statuatory Declaration includes on Domestic First-Year Contracts, when necessary
custom_steps:
Wiki: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784721/Minor+Contract+Printing+Rules|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784721/Minor+Contract+Printing+Rules|smart-link] 

Context: With the potential for international players to sign domestic contracts, the domestic contract needs to be updated to handle intl scenarios, in this case, printing Australian Statuatory Declaration.

AC:

* Disclaimer: this logic should match what is currently being done on the Intl First Year Contracts
* If a player is from Australia, the Australian Statutory Declaration will be printed with the Addendum H
* The players Age will dictate which version of the form is included

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see Add H on Domestic First Year MNCs
custom_steps:
AC:

* The Addendum H will appear as an option on Domestic First Year Contracts
* The Add H will default to No
* If the Add H is included on the contract, it will work as expected
** It will work the same as it does on the Intl First-Year Contracts

Note: there are multiple types of Add H based on the playerâ€™s country

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Add B portion of Non-First Year Minor Contracts updated
custom_steps:
AC:

* The following Add B provisions will be removed from Non-First Year MN Contracts:
** Minor -League Terms
*** Opening Day Roster Bonus
*** Remain On Roster Bonus
** Major-League Terms
*** MLR 9(c) Provision
*** Payroll Deduction Clause
* Clubs will no longer have the ability to add Minor League Miscellaneous
** The Yes/No toggle will be inactive for Club Users
** BOC Users will be able to add the provision
* Clubs will no longer have the ability to add Major League Miscellaneous
** The Yes/No toggle will be inactive for Club Users
** BOC Users will be able to add the provision

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Add B portion of Domestic First Year Contracts updated
custom_steps:
AC:

* The following Add B covenants will be added to the Domestic First Year MN Contracts
** Signing Bonus with Visa Contingency
** Dual Sport Language with Visa Contingency
** Age and Identity Fraud
* These provisions will be included conditionally and will only appear if the player is an international player (not subject to the Rule 4 draft)
** If the player is subject to the Rule 4 draft, they will not be displayed.
* These provisions will be included in the printed contract and will be displayed as expected.
